KEYBOARD_DIRECTIVES.DESCRIPTION: Type some value in the inputs and then press Enter in any of them to trigger the callback function
KEYBOARD_DIRECTIVES.INPUT_WITHOUT_CONTEXT: Without bound context (bound values are not accessible)
KEYBOARD_DIRECTIVES.INPUT_WITHOUT_CONTEXT_ALTERNATIVE: Without bound context but passed as parameter
KEYBOARD_DIRECTIVES.TYPE_AND_PRESS_ENTER: Type a value and press Enter
KEYBOARD_DIRECTIVES.TYPE_PRESS_ENTER_AND_CHECK_CONSOLE: Type a value, press Enter and check the console
